Code of Conduct Assessment Scenarios


Challenge

Code of Conduct readings are a staple of every large company. But how do you take its sensitive and heavy content and turn it into an engaging and memorable learning experience?

The business required a follow-up assessment to Code of Conduct reading with the goal of providing context to sensitive ethical matters outlined in the documentation.


Solution

By using minimalistic design and animation styles, my team and I created 4 scenario-based assessments, and released in both English and French. The training has been in use since 2020 and remains a well-reviewed compliance course.


Technologies Used

After Effects, Audition, Illustrator, Storyline
